060708±08000408 >>
c#08à0004060708±070406030000±0306040209[08000408]0305
080004080802・010208・0408040705060708±±01090708à09040501080004080802×÷070108à09040603060203ò0304°0308020204080505010108010509080602set0201get07é080202030606(set0201get07070608・00±0807è0001・01020806080307050105030307010103ü×0008±・01020806080307070509ù080308020800040803à0101)05010205010301080105080004080603060708±±0109070606000803ò080503090603060708±±010907080200080305

080004080705060708±・04・0808à09040501070706080908040108010701virtual0304abstract0304override0806010103ü×0008050403040408000408000104050305

000208050502

using System;

class A
{
	int num = 0;
	
	public int a
	{
		set
		{
			num = value;
		}
		get
		{
			return num;
		}
	}
}

class Program
{
	static void Main(string[] args)
	{
		A a = new A();
		Console.WriteLine(a.a);
		a.a = 100;
		Console.WriteLine(a.a);
	}
}

0801060204á01040502
0
100

070700090501090808àA000408000408a08020606000801080105a0802set07é00040802value050006030909A08à09040704060708±num050101080105a0802get07é03090603090909040704060708±num080200080305

----


0101070302040104(delegate) >>
020401040805c#000107040802060302060501020401040802×÷070108à09040703c/c++0004080202040805000609050501080002040104080508à0401°050600080205010803c#0004050102040104±0308±×÷0603060208à07050505050106ò090308010701・0408040705class08à090403050204010400§06000307030108090900・040502×÷0501020501030808030009à06020101060302040805050801040802020408050802°ó09080305

delegate ・080301000808à0401 020401040104(05020805±í);

04è0609×04060908020805050102040104070508à060803°0204080508à0904050102040104080209080602080505030205050900×0803020408050004080203050204010408020908060207070608080306000000030401ü01040709030103ò0805×÷02090206060208à0802060708±050108000204010408020908060205030205・03080302040805080202040805000202030305

	0204080502030606;

event 020401040104 080003060104;

event 020401040104 080003060104 = ・0402030204010402040805050801040802020408050104;				//070706080803000808010701010108ì02040805

{
	0204080502030606;

0506・04080003060502
080003060104(・0402030204010405080104080205020805±í);

07070703080003060805060300000001080908020204010408080805050106ò050907050204010405030101050105030205080306000000050307ò020101ü01040709030100040908060208000306050100030205040008000306×÷02090206060208à0802060708±080504030404090806020501080003060705040901080802060708±08à090405010805080408à0802・01020806080307070100040305
08÷070108000306070508÷07010204010408080805・04・08080501ê060003à010108020305
0800030603ú0004080504010904c#0608030903030801080203ù05030305

000208050502
 
using System;

namespace ConsoleApplication1
{
	delegate void getMessage(string mes);					//020401040707060809080602080306000000050307ò03ò080501ü010407090301

	class Program
	{
		static void Main(string[] args)
		{
			Event events = new Event();
			events.myEvent += Program.eventHandler;
			events.myEvent += delegate(string str)			//08000306°ó090808040204010402010104・04・08
			{
				Console.WriteLine("This is the {0}!", str);
			};
			events.showEvent("Test Text");					//0506・0408000306
		}

		static void eventHandler(string str)
		{
			Console.WriteLine("This is the eventHandler!");
		}
	}

	class Event
	{
		public event getMessage myEvent;		//0908060208000306
		public void showEvent(string str)		//0506・0408000306080202040805
		{
			myEvent(str);		//08÷0701080003060808080505010506・0408000306
		}
	}
}

0801060204á01040502
This is the eventHandler!
This is the Test Text!
